scripts.build:ipfs: yarn && yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph build --ipfs https://testnet.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.deploy-testing: yarn && yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy davekaj/graph-network-practice-two --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-staging: yarn && yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-network-testnet-staging --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.prepare:rinkeby: yarn prep:addresses:rinkeby && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
